par1: Right now, your inbox only includes debt statements. These are letters about money you may owe to Service Canada. You may not currently owe any money, but all debt statements from 2021 to the present are available in your inbox.
par2: In the future, we’ll add other communications about your benefits and services.
par3: For information from other benefits and services, see:
par4-list-item-ei-status.text: Employment Insurance: view my status updates and messages
par4-list-item-cdcp-letters.text: Canada Dental Care Plan: view my letters
par4-list-item-cdb-letters.text: Canada Disability Benefit: view my letters
par5-part1: Don’t miss a debt statement message. Set your
par5-part3: to get emails when new debt statements are available.
